events.comment: Restrict the speed when moving on some objects

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Lim98SE
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: MouseHelper
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Turn any object into a cursor.
description: This extension aloows to replace the cursor with an object.

- The button behavior has been removed. The button object can be used instead. Some ready to use buttons can be downloaded from the [Buttons pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=menu-buttons-menu-buttons) of the asset store.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Turn any object into a mouse cursor.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: cursor

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Entropy
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: DrawPathfinding
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Draw the pathfinding of an object using a shape painter.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Draw the path followed by an object using a shape painter.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Draw the path followed by the object using a shape painter.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: DrawPathfinding

eventsFunctions.description: Draw the path followed by the object using a shape painter. It automatically creates an instance of the shape painter object if there is none.
eventsFunctions.name: DrawPathfinding
eventsFunctions.sentence: Draw the path followed by _PARAM0_ using _PARAM3_

events.comment: Create the shape painter if one doesn't exist

parameters.description: Shape painter used to draw the path
parameters.name: ShapePainterObject
